name: Infernal (itch)
description:
(First game by Frederick Chantal and Alexandre Fortin)

My fresh start as a tormentor has gone sour when my co-workers broke my wings and stole my trident... 

Now with this broken sword I found, I need to hurry and do my job tormenting the soul of the damned and then have my meeting with Satan!!! 

(R : Reset to last checkpoint) 

(T : Reset level) 

(Left click : Fireball) 

(Right click : Sword Attack)

(Red Fireball : Damage)

 (Black Fireball : Healing)

(Blue Fireball : Boost stats + Healing)      

(Escape : Quit game)
